MTM.Summary: Student is struggling with coding and calculus courses, leading to doubts about their academic choices.
MTM.Patterns: Feeling overwhelmed, questioning decisions, academic stress
MTM.Goals: Improve coding skills, manage academic workload, reconsider course choices
MTM.Transition: The student might change their major or seek additional support.

LTM.Milestone: Enrolled in an Intro to Comp Sci course, marking the beginning of a potential career in technology.
LTM.Implications: This could lead to a long-term career in tech or pivot towards a different field.
LTM.Lessons: Importance of foundational knowledge, need for resilience, value of seeking help

short_term.goal: Complete a project using Java or another coding language to build confidence
Attend workshops or seminars on AI and machine learning to understand emerging trends

long_term: Develop a career path in technology with a focus on AI-driven development

MTM.Summary: Student is making new friends in college while feeling disconnected from high school peers.
MTM.Patterns: New friendships, social transition, feeling of disconnection
MTM.Goals: Strengthen new relationships, maintain connections with old friends, adjust to new social environment
MTM.Transition: The student is in the process of reshaping their social circle.

short_term.goal: Organize a study group with peers to foster new relationships and share knowledge
Set up regular check-ins with old friends to maintain connections

long_term: Create a balanced social network that supports personal and professional growth

MTM.Summary: Student is facing existential crises and mood swings influenced by college life and weather.
MTM.Patterns: Existential crises, mood swings, weather-related mood changes
MTM.Goals: Find coping mechanisms, seek support, improve mental health
MTM.Transition: The student is learning to manage stress and adapt to new environments.

LTM.Milestone: First significant encounter with existential crises in college.
LTM.Implications: This experience will shape the student's approach to mental health and resilience.
LTM.Lessons: Importance of mental health, coping strategies, self-awareness

short_term.goal: Establish a routine for stress management techniques like mindfulness or yoga
Seek professional mental health support if existential crises persist

long_term: Maintain a holistic approach to mental and physical health for long-term well-being

MTM.Summary: Student is experiencing financial strain due to high living costs in NYC.
MTM.Patterns: Financial stress, realization of being broke, longing for cheaper options
MTM.Goals: Budget better, find part-time work, adjust expectations
MTM.Transition: The student needs to adapt their financial habits to the city's cost of living.

short_term.goal: Create a detailed budget plan to manage expenses in NYC
Secure a part-time job or internship in tech or finance to increase income

long_term: Achieve financial independence through career growth and smart financial management

MTM.Summary: Student is reflecting on the authenticity of happiness and others' life plans.
MTM.Patterns: Existential reflections, questioning authenticity, finding comfort in shared struggles
MTM.Goals: Develop a personal philosophy, understand others' perspectives, build self-confidence
MTM.Transition: The student is developing a more nuanced view of life and happiness.

LTM.Milestone: Realization that many people might be faking confidence and life plans.
LTM.Implications: This could lead to a more empathetic and realistic outlook on life.
LTM.Lessons: Not everyone has it figured out, value of authenticity, importance of empathy

short_term.goal: Join a philosophy or ethics club to explore existential questions with peers
Read books or articles on digital consciousness and its implications

long_term: Develop a personal philosophy that integrates technology and human experience

MTM.Summary: Student is experiencing frustration with coding, particularly Java.
MTM.Patterns: Frustration with coding, negative view on technology, extreme reactions
MTM.Goals: Overcome coding challenges, develop patience, find enjoyment in technology
MTM.Transition: The student might explore other aspects of technology or seek alternative learning methods.

LTM.Milestone: First significant struggle with coding, marking a challenging point in the student's tech journey.
LTM.Implications: This could impact the student's future relationship with technology and programming.
LTM.Lessons: Coding requires practice and patience, tech isn't always easy, importance of problem-solving skills

short_term.goal: Learn Python alongside Java to expand coding proficiency
Participate in hackathons or coding challenges to apply learned skills

long_term: Become proficient in AI and machine learning technologies for career advancement

MTM.Summary: Engaging in networking and career development through internships and group discussions.
MTM.Transition: Moving towards a more collaborative career approach.

LTM.Milestone: Enrolled in an Intro to Comp Sci course, marking the beginning of a potential career in technology.
LTM.Implications: This could lead to a long-term career in tech or pivot towards a different field.
LTM.Lessons: Importance of foundational knowledge, need for resilience, value of seeking help

LTM.Milestone: Landed first internship at a quant firm.
LTM.Implications: This could lead to a long-term career in finance or technology.
LTM.Lessons: Importance of networking, seizing opportunities, balancing work and personal life

short_term.goal: Complete an advanced Python programming course online
Secure a summer internship at a tech company focusing on AI or blockchain

long_term: Establish a career in technology, focusing on emerging fields like AI or blockchain technology, potentially leading to a senior role or entrepreneurial venture.

MTM.Summary: Exploring new relationships and experiencing the emotional highs of dating.
MTM.Transition: Entering a new phase of personal and social life.

LTM.Milestone: Had first date with someone from class, chemistry was good.
LTM.Implications: This marks the beginning of a potentially significant relationship.
LTM.Lessons: Vulnerability, embracing new experiences, personal growth

short_term.goal: Join at least two local tech meetups or networking events
Develop a deeper connection with at least one new relationship through shared interests in technology

long_term: Foster meaningful, long-lasting relationships that support personal and professional growth, potentially leading to a life partner with shared tech interests.

MTM.Summary: Balancing work and personal life with occasional indulgences.
MTM.Patterns: Celebrating achievements, managing stress, environmental impact
MTM.Goals: Maintain work-life balance, improve physical comfort
MTM.Transition: Adjusting lifestyle to meet changing demands.

LTM.Milestone: First significant encounter with existential crises in college.
LTM.Implications: This experience will shape the student's approach to mental health and resilience.
LTM.Lessons: Importance of mental health, coping strategies, self-awareness

LTM.Milestone: First time celebrating coding breakthrough with takeout, indicating work-life balance.
LTM.Implications: This could set a precedent for future work-life balance practices.
LTM.Lessons: Celebration of small wins, importance of balance, self-care

short_term.goal: Implement a weekly tech-free day to enhance mental health and balance
Engage in mindfulness practices to manage stress related to tech career demands

long_term: Achieve a sustainable work-life balance, ensuring personal well-being while advancing in a technology-driven career.

MTM.Summary: Exploring financial investments and tools for market analysis.
MTM.Transition: Moving towards more informed financial decision-making.

LTM.Milestone: First consideration of investing in blockchain and crypto.
LTM.Implications: This could lead to new financial strategies and opportunities.
LTM.Lessons: Importance of staying updated with new technologies, risk assessment, diversification

short_term.goal: Invest in a diversified portfolio including blockchain-based assets
Save 10% of internship earnings for further education or tech start-up investment

long_term: Build financial independence through tech investments, with a focus on emerging technologies and sustainable growth.

MTM.Summary: Reflecting on life's pace and personal growth.

LTM.Milestone: Realization that many people might be faking confidence and life plans.
LTM.Implications: This could lead to a more empathetic and realistic outlook on life.
LTM.Lessons: Not everyone has it figured out, value of authenticity, importance of empathy

LTM.Milestone: Realization of the fast evolution of the world and personal growth.
LTM.Implications: This could influence future life choices and philosophies.

short_term.goal: Read and reflect on two books about the impact of technology on society
Participate in a discussion group about the ethics of AI and digital consciousness

long_term: Develop a philosophical framework that integrates technology with human values, contributing to ethical guidelines in tech development.

MTM.Summary: Engaging with emerging technologies like blockchain and NFTs.
MTM.Patterns: Exploration of new tech, curiosity, community involvement
MTM.Goals: Understand and leverage new technologies, network with like-minded individuals
MTM.Transition: Becoming more tech-savvy and involved in tech communities.

LTM.Milestone: First significant struggle with coding, marking a challenging point in the student's tech journey.
LTM.Implications: This could impact the student's future relationship with technology and programming.
LTM.Lessons: Coding requires practice and patience, tech isn't always easy, importance of problem-solving skills

LTM.Milestone: First engagement with blockchain technology and NFTs.
LTM.Implications: This could lead to involvement in tech innovation and digital asset management.
LTM.Lessons: Innovation, technology's impact on society, networking in tech communities

short_term.goal: Gain proficiency in at least one blockchain development platform
Experiment with AI-driven code generation tools to understand their capabilities

long_term: Lead or contribute significantly to projects involving AI-driven development automation or sustainable space technology, influencing the tech landscape.
